name: Boqizhang Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Sales Group Boqizhang Coal Industry Company

The Boqizhang Coal Mine is an underground coal mine with a construction scale of 1.2 million tons per year

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Sales Group Boqizhang Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coal Transportation and Sales Group, with ownership shared among Jinneng Group (26%), China Energy (25%), and Zuoyun Kaihao Industrial Company (49%).
